website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that results in good, even color at a lower price.
pros: This water-based formula goes on smooth and doesn't contain any bronzer

customer_reviews.title: I usually get tan in the summer but I’m pretty fair so it was never anything crazy
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time last summer and it made me the tannest I have ever been! I usually get tan in the summer but I’m pretty fair so it was never anything crazy. But this does wonders! I never got burnt from this (the few times I burnt was probably from not reapplying sunblock, not from the Maui babe). I have a side by side picture of my sister and I who have very similar skin tones. I used Maui babe all summer and she didn’t and you can definitely see the difference. I will use this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lotion with absolutely great smell♥️
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it ... Smells incredible... why in the world ppl claim that it smells bad??? It smells like a coffee beans and to me it’s so good! I never got sunburnt and the color I achieved is just amazing so far ...
customer_reviews.author: DENA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF. Just be sure to apply sunscreen and follow directions for the first time. This stuff is no joke. It does have a distinct smell and can rub off on light colored clothing, but I love it. I gives me an even tan and I don't mind the smell at all. I use this every summer.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Gets you dark fast
customer_reviews.text: This product really does get you tan fast. It’s not the best for preventing sun burns but if you time your exposure right this will get you really dark. Only reason why I give it 3 stars is because first off it smells very eggy and the texture is oily and hard to get off your skin with one shower and if it gets on your swimsuit or towel it will stain and not come out no matter what stain removal method you could try. I only wear black swimsuits with it
customer_reviews.author: Dean M. Gerstein

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my very favorite outdoor tanning products. Ever. I'm somewhat fair skinned naturally, so I use it once I've got a good base tan. It leaves my skin soft and moist, and does a great job of helping to quickly build color. We don't all have hours every day to lay out, so this definitely helps expedite the process!
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel, love the smell, love the color I get after just one day in the sun. Even my husband asked to use it! For anyone who experienced a rash - always patch test any new skin product before applying all over. Used by husband (pale skin prone to burning), a friend who typically uses sunscreen, & myself (naturally tan skin) - each of us with sensitive skin. None of us have anything but a tan. It does liquify in high temps or sunlight, so keep it in a pocket of your bag or wrapped in a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D

customer_reviews.title: Tan and happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie this stuff is pretty gross. It smells and feels slippery on the skin. It smells like barbecue sauce which is gross but nice because when I'm sitting in the sun with it on I feel like a piece of chicken on the grill which I find amusing and immersive. This is not something you want to put on in public. You stay home, slather it on and go do your thing. If you sweat, its going to drip off brown but its okay because the tan you quickly get is 10/10. Completely worth smelling like BBQ chicken for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Would like refund or replacement
customer_reviews.text: My product was damaged and leaked inside and outside the bag it was placed in. I would like a replacement or refund. I recommend adding more padding to the packaging so products can’t get damaged as easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wanna be a human fly strip.. this is your chance.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this before and I think it’s changed over the years . I swear it’s made out of lotion and brown sugar! The ants and bugs love to invade your space with this lotion on! Felt like I was a fly strip. Def won’t ever buy this again. Threw it away after first use. Heck even the teenage girls didn’t want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoop

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for years. The best tanning lotion ever!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Skaparas

customer_reviews.title: Greasiness to the extreme
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a few times for indoor tanning and I HATE it. It leaves me a greasy mess, streaks clothes (fortunately I knew this before) and smells nasty. I love coffee and chocolate- don’t get me wrong - but the smell of this is like some day old coffee. I guess it does what it’s supposed to do, but the way in which it does it - with greasiness and a horrible smell - is no good. 2 stars :(
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Smells like coffee
customer_reviews.text: It definitely stains your skin a little which is why people ask if it’s a bronzer I’m sure. You can smell the coffee in it. You have to do sections at a time and make sure you get it on and rub it in evenly otherwise it looks like you rubbed mud all over your body. It offers zero protection so make sure you put sunscreen on first and let that dry COMPLETELY before putting this stuff on. Also, this is meant for outside use only, not for beds. They sell one specifically for beds. Not sure the difference is but I’ll be purchasing that one next.
customer_reviews.author: Arica

customer_reviews.title: Product is watered down
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product previously from our local Ulta. I went to Amazon this last time I was close to running out for a refill due to Ulta being out at that time. I still have a little bit left in my bottle from Ulta as well as the new bottle from here. When comparing, the new lotion is not as dark, takes longer to rub in and the scent isn't as strong. To me it appears that the product is watered down, or has been altered. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yerbey

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!! I have naturally olive colored skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! I have naturally olive colored skin, so my friends that are very fair skinned were annoyed thinking that this was only for people with my type of skin tone - but I promised them it wasn't. Sure enough, my blonde hair blue eyed friends were thanking me for their nice sun than that they acquired after using this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: lascanio

customer_reviews.title: Bronzing oil
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my last vacation and it is awesome! Smells a little funky, and it will get on your clothes / towels so use sparingly, but it definitely boosted my tan! Make sure you have a base tan underneath or you will FRY your skin. Or make sure you use sunscreen underneath. Overall I would definitely purchase again as I like tanning oils and found this one very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Valek

customer_reviews.title: Like covering yourself in a thick brown soy sauce
customer_reviews.text: The smell on this is pretty funky, and be prepared to turn everything around you brown. This is my first time buying so I can't speak towards brand quality (maybe had I bought off Amazon it's different?). This lotion is thick and brown, so I would be curious how much it actually increases tanning vs. the psychological effect of sitting out covered in brown lotion. Either way, I couldn't get over the smell or the greasy brown marks on everything. Test this one out alone on a dark towel in a dark suit.
customer_reviews.author: MCurtis

customer_reviews.title: 5 star but smell and color!
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders! I recently bought it and have a tan line from one day out in the sun. If you like chocolate this is for you! Smells just like it! I have a larger chest and can't not find a lot of bathing suits unless I order them online and the two that I have for this summer are white. Unfortunately, this product is very dark, definitely will get on your bathing suit when you're applying it. It leaves your hands with that orange self tanner looks so make sure you rinse them right after. Other than the smell and the color I would highly suggest it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Forsberg

customer_reviews.title: Gradual and subtle, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this every other day since I got it about 10 days ago. I have very fair skin and don't really tan or burn easily. At first it made no difference, but finally I can see tan lines! I'm not as dark as I'd like to be yet and my legs are struggling to pick up any color but I think with a couple more uses I'll really have decently tanned skin. It absolutely is a mess to put on, super oily and streaks if you don't rub it in right away. And it literally smells like teriyaki and old syrup lol Not sure I'd purchase again but for now it's getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope..
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product for the fact I am of Hawaiian decent and do not tan very easily. I am all about supporting the islands and businesses. However, not blaming WHERE it came from but HOW it was handled in transit... listen to the reviews 100%. Took a chance ourselves and we received our bottle within good time but with a hole in the bottom with the lotion already crusted over leaking all over. Also, ABSOLUTELY not a pleasant smell as we hoped would also be a false accusation. Not worth sending back since like I said we are all for the supporting role and also the product has traveled from the islands to Indiana. 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is amazing for a great tan. It has a funky scent but works wonderfully. I usually let it stand for about an hour after tanning and then take a shower to wash the oily base away but overall it is great for pool, beach and lake. I even start getting a base tan at a tanning salon with it before trips. Because it is a bit thick and oily after tanning with the mixture of sweat, I recommend wiping out your tanning bed after use so it doesn't leave residue. They also offer a after tan lotion that I haven't tried yet but will leave a rating.
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photos, browning lotion I already had (dab on the left) and the one I just received (dab on the right), these are NOT the same product. The "yellow" cap is the new lotion just received through Amazon. Not even close to the depth of brown color or the same consistency. I would guess something has been added (mixed) into the product and resold. Looking at pictures on the web and the picture provided by Amazon, all authentic bottles of Maui Babe have a WHITE cap, not YELLOW! Be careful... Amazon does not verify authenticity of products sold through them. Let's see if they post this review!
customer_reviews.author: L Flower

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: So I got this because the reviews were decent and I can't tan to save my life! I definitely never got any color from this, the smell isn't great, and every time it's been placed in a beach/pool bag the snap lid has popped open and some product oozed out and stained items...definitely store it with plastic wrap underneath the lid to prevent this, it was like pressure kept building up and popping the lid open even just sitting upright in room temperature. Will not repurchase :(
customer_reviews.author: Courtney DP

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it again!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so great and mind you I’m Scotch-Irish lol literally the whitest person. I mix it with SPF and it makes me glow! I achieve such a pretty sun kissed tan with out having to bake in the sun. It is a little greasy but I imagine most people will only use it near the pool or beach. I personally love the way it smells. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jmalon

customer_reviews.title: Results in a day
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about this working. But it actually works! I figured I’d try it out while I vacation in Maui. Lol (I’m serious I actually bought it for the vacation there) I figured if I was gonna be pool side and beach side to tan too. The smell is not terrible unless you’re putting your nose to it then it’s like coffee scent. I suggest put on sunscreen then 15 min later this lotion! It does brown your clothes if you where tanning lotion and shorts. Otherwise it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Alina H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: You will be greased up like a pig but you will be the most bronzed pig of all time. Legit—do not touch or sit on anything while this is on. Grease everywhere but you will NEVER BE THIS DARK FROM ANYTHING ELSE. My husband is a ginger. Red and burnt is all he gets. He looked like a bronzed god. Not orange. TAN! I have turned everyone I know on to this! It’s so hard to find in stock anywhere because the word got out about how amazing it it. Buy while you can. Actually a few. One last thing. Store in a ziplock bag. It does leak. Everyone leaks. It’s all the grease the comes out the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good but comes with some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most popular tanning lotion advertised online right now and I thought to try it out. It works well and definitely accelerated my tan. There are two big downsides to it though...the smell isn’t the best and it’s extremely sticky/DOESNT blend well. It clumps on my skin and attracts bugs because of how sticky and greasy it is. Gross...I know. It also will come off if you plan on getting wet. Some positives to the Maui Babe lotion is that the company offers a similar coconut scented lotion (which I plan to try out), instant bronzing, and moisturizing ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssandra Brooke

customer_reviews.title: How have I been living without this?
customer_reviews.text: So I was at the beach a couple weeks ago and my friend told me to try this stuff. I already have a really good tan but this was amazing! I got even darker when I didn't know it was possible. When I got home I ordered my own bottle from Amazon. I bring it with me to the pool and the beach. I love it! I'm also obsessed with the smell. It smells a bit like coffee. A little bit goes a long way too so you'll get plenty of use out of this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Straw

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and Oily
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the smell at all. It wasn't as described by other buyers. It smelled like a failed batch of nut based salad dressing. My palms turned brown but luckily it did wash off. It was so oily I was worried it wpuld stain my suit so I hand washed it in Dawn after. It didn't really give a faster tan either.
customer_reviews.author: Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Works great & use with SPF!
customer_reviews.text: I love this browning lotion so much, arrived with no issues, i personally like the smell of it! It works really well for me and i’m definitely on the pale side! VERY important to apply spf before you apply the lotion because it’s not a skin protectant. just a couple uses and i can already see a huge difference! left my skin very soft as well. only downside is that it’s not waterproof and it’s a bit messy! so i would recommend wearing a black swimsuit and use a towel you don’t care if it stains.
customer_reviews.author: Loneleestone

customer_reviews.title: Super oily, and leaves a residue on my leather ...
customer_reviews.text: Let ve this stuff for sitting outside getting a little sun on my legs. Super oily, and leaves a residue on my leather seats of my car. Best used at home and washed off when done being in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2013

customer_reviews.title: Meh’
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with high expectations based off reviews and in my opinion it’s middle of the road. I am a sunshine lover so I’ve tried many lotions and oils and I can not say I love this one. I tan fairly easy with anything so this one is no different. I dislike the smell and greasiness of this lotion. It’s ok but not sure I’d purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KimG

customer_reviews.title: don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: I fee into the TikTok hype and purchased this tanning product. The lotion itself does have a strong smell but I don’t think it’s as bad as everyone claims it to be. However, this product leaves STAINS. If you don’t wash your hands after applying your hands will be orange (assuming it’s the bronzer) but it has stained my suit and towel. I don’t recommend this product unless you’re wearing a black bathing suit. It is also hard to run in. You have to start immediately after putting it in our skin or it will be streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I used this with a friend at a water park. She has ivory skin, and I have olive. Both of us were tan within 25 minutes, and neither one of us burned. This was back in November, and I still have a tan line from then. I can't wait to try this at the beach this month! The only downside is this will stain clothes and your hands if not removed promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Old sticky pancakes..
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to smell and feel like old pancakes don’t buy this.. do yourself a favor and order carroten. You’re welcome! Maybe this is one of those products that doesn’t have the real lotion in it but to be safe don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Worcestershire sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Some things I dont like to buy online. Typically lotions are one of those things because I cant smell them. Be warned!! This smells 100% like Worcestershire sauce. 100%. Lol! I got it, took it on our cruise with us, never opening it, put it on just before hitting the beach...I told my husband what does this smell like? I smelled it before? Worcestershire. That's what it is. Then, my sister and husband smelled it too...yep. Worcestershire. I never touched it again. As a matter of fact...I left it on the cruise ship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: People at work are asking me how I’m so tan...
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is amazing! I live way up north in Minnesota and thanks to this stuff, it’s super easy to get a nice tan. It does smell kinda funky - like a combo of soy sauce and coffee - but it helps me get brown quickly! I use it every time I’m going outside to lay in the sun to get a nice, long lasting and deep tan! I used to use olive oil to tan, but I had to keep applying it every 15 minutes or so because it would soak right in to my skin, but Maui Babe doesn’t soak in, making it superior for tanning!
customer_reviews.author: AliCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Literally the best out there for a quick even tan!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanning lotion. It works wonders and really helps you get a good even tan. Picked some up while in Hawaii a few years back and bought a couple bottles to take home. I was super excited when I find out Amazon carried it as well. You will not be disappointed. The only bad thing is it's very oily and has a strange smell, not bad just strange.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never buy another tanning lotion AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion was introduced to me at first while visiting a family meme we in Florida. Having never heard of it before, I used it while vacationing. After the first day of using on my skin in the Florida sun you would think that I was vacationing for 3 weeks after just 1 day! If you’re looking for your golden tan and love the smell if coffee, look no further. Purchase this tanning lotion and I guarantee you will never purchase any other.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barbato

customer_reviews.title: The quick way it tans me.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over 10 years since I went to Hawai n found it in ABC store. Tans so much more than regular lotion and so quick. If getting to much sun, I spray 75 sunscreen over it. Love the way it leaves my skin so soft. Tan lasts a long time too. Only bad thing is it colors hands when put on but washes off hands. Love it and will always use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Seriously STINKY
customer_reviews.text: This lotion works great, but I was under the impression, because it was Maui, and assuming it was related to tropical coconutty, beach bliss... this lotion stinks so bad. Almost so much so I prefer not to even use it. Maybe a old rotting coffee smell? Not sure.. being tan isn't so important to me that I want to smell like this.
customer_reviews.author: karen maxwell

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this product because it is very greasy and messy
customer_reviews.text: I used this about 3 or 4 times and when I used it I put it on my arms, legs, face, and back, the only place it really gave me a tan at was my legs and fairly. I did not like this product because it is very greasy and messy. When I got it in the box in the mail it was in very good condition for me, but when I first opened it exploded all a lot of the product out into my sink and the wall by my sink. If you like that oily feeling this product will most likely be good for you but if you don't I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Been buying this product for years and it never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible!! I get tan with just one use. It smells a little like chocolate. It is a little hard to rub into the skin sometimes, but it definitely gets the job done. Also, be careful getting it on your clothes if it isn’t a dark color. It stains! Other than that, I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: No difference after using several times
customer_reviews.text: It kinda makes your skin look tan when you first put it on (due to the brown color of the cream) but post-tanning you are just as white as when you started... or just sunburned. Maybe I don't reapply enough, but still, as a super pale chick, I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: richinsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Tanning is everything
customer_reviews.text: Ok maybe not, but once you get your "baseline" tan, this takes it to your next level. I've been using this since my teens and I'm a little past that now.. ok a lot but I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works better and faster than anything I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: Well to be blatantly honest, it is very oily, The smell reminds me of a coffee, it does transfer brown color/grease to to your clothes and towel so lay out in something you don’t mind to ruin. It turns the palms of your hands dark brown until you wash them... but I have never tanned so fast! This product definitely WORKS!! I laid out for 20 minutes total and had a nice tan! If you can get past all the cons to it, it definitely is a good product that truly works!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Law

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS 😊
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Received this yesterday, used it today...IT WORKS. I love it. I'll be buying more very soon. Thank you so much for having this awesome product. I'm from Southeast Asia, during the winter I lose all my color. Maui Babe Browning Lotion gives me beautiful bronze skin color.
customer_reviews.author: khamvah

customer_reviews.title: Very oily and strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out because people were raving about this lotion. However, it is incredibly greasy and heavy, like slathering on thick oil NOT lotion. The smell reminds me of week-old coffee grounds left in the coffee machine, but this does wear off shortly after applying. Overall, it was just uncomfortable and left me feeling too sticky/oily. Plus the brown color does leave a mark on bathing suits; not a permanent stain but still annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Smells like crap, greasy as heck but DOES THE JOB better than any tanning lotion out there! This is my forever tanning lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Atltigress

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion.
customer_reviews.text: I swear I got 4 shades darker in 2 uses! It smells awful though. It smells like some combination of coffee and burnt bacon. When I first put it on, I swore if I didn't see a noticeable difference I wouldn't ever use it again because of the smell. Once I saw the results I didn't care about it anymore. Slather it on and let me stink, at least I'll be tan!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Get aloe too
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled by the pictures, if you typically burn you will burn WAY MORE with this. I used to tan really nicely but this stuff had me peeling for literally three weeks after my burn. I’m pretty dark now, no one calls me the friendly ghost anymore but be prepared with aloe.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Want to smell like soy sauce????
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to enhance my tan at the beach. I could not get past the smell! It smelled like I was putting soy sauce all over my body. If you can get past the smell, it does work, but not any better than any other tanning lotion that that doesn’t make you like old coffee and left over Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning lotion on the market without costing a fortune creates a very nice tan without having to tan to often, to keep your tan looking fantastic. Also it is made from kona coffee beans which is a natural protection against skin cancer
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Smells great like chocolate coffee
customer_reviews.text: definitely works BUT leaves a dark brown stain on anything until you shower. I'd still keep this to use at the pool or beach but not for a tanning bed. Smells great like chocolate coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Really good. Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used it for three summers now. The only thing is- the tan doesn't last long. It seems like 2 weeks after summer is over. The tan is gone. Also. It is not water proof. The second I go in the water I need to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: laChelle

customer_reviews.title: ehhh
customer_reviews.text: the lotion is nice i guess, i havent gotten the chance to use it but i hope it works! one thing i dont like about it is that the smell is almost like a barbecue sauce you would put on your food! and it is very oily and sticky but if it works ill manage with the smell i guess
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I have never reviewed anything on Amazon, but I have to say something about this lotion. I am very pale and tanning is super difficult for me, but after just one 10 minute session in a tanning booth with this lotion I have been told my three people my skin looks amazingly tan. I hope the results continue to stay this amazing, but I'm almost positive they will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Maui Babe is the best browning lotion on the market. If you are looking for a great tan, then buy this product. It smells good, it has a tad of a moisturizer in it, but it gives you a great tan even after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy J

customer_reviews.title: Golden tan for days
customer_reviews.text: I put this on over my tingle factor tanning lotion, and after a few hours in the sun, I’m noticeably darker. Definitely store in a cool, dry, low light area. And it will rub off on your clothes until you’ve showered, so plan ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I 1st tried this stuff last year and ordering another bottle now. It smells amazing and you get super dark without any fake orange tint. It makes your skin so soft... However some reviews mentioned leaking/ exploding during shipping. Mine def did a bit of the same. Wish they could wrap it up somehow where if it starts to leak from pressure you could still collect and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: IS AS ADVERTISED. I have fairly pale skin (without MB I tan for a day, peel, and go back pale) and this product works great. Use it every time I am out in the sun adds 1-2 days to my tan. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory J. Byall

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this browning lotion for over ten years! It smells SO GOOD, and works even better than it smells. The ingredients are naturally derived from Hawaii and it takes you to tropical paradise every time you apply it. It really works too, I get super dark when I use it. Super moisturizing and I never burn when I use this!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Third time ordering this greatness!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good about this stuff. Talk about MAGIC. I had a weird tan line from my running shorts and used this everyday to fix it. I got another bottle when it ran out and took it on 2 cruises. It doesn't smell bad, it's not greasy, it doesn't stain, and it has no bronzer. I used it in the natural sun and a tanning bed. The tanning salon had no probs with me using it in their beds because it is not oil based. I will be buying more come summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Whamp

customer_reviews.title: Golden Brown
customer_reviews.text: My husband used to use this in Hawaii when he lived there so we bought some recently. It is a great product. Has a sweet smell but goes on more like oil it is not sunscreen replacement. I really like the color you get from it while being in the sun. Nice and even tanning
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: BEST OUTDOOR TANNING LOTION
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using Maui babe for years now. Best out door tanning lotion in the world. There's no SPF so if your going to lay out start 15 mins if your fair skinned work your way up. I do 20 on my front 20 on my back. Then another 20 on each sides. About 5 times laying out you will have a base tan. THIS STUFF WORKS
customer_reviews.author: Paige B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before when I worked at a surf shop so I already knew I was obsessed with it! But I was nervous ordering it in the mail thinking it may arrive leaking or something- but it came perfectly wrapped! And the little Hawaiian stamps and note from Nani were so cute it made my day! I’m so happy! I’ll def be buying again💜💜💜 thank you! Xoxo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor tanning
customer_reviews.text: I use this as tanning lotion when I tan outdoors and it is amazing. I see a huge difference after using it vs using other tanning lotions or oils. I like the smell of it, it kinda smells like coffee and chocolate when you first put it on and then the smell fades. The only thing I dislike about it is how it feels on my skin, it's not too horrible but it can be sticky and when you sweat you can sweat it off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this would create a long-lasting tan, however, it did not. It washed off after I showered. I applied and laid in the sun for a few hours and nothing. The brown color only lasted until I showered.
customer_reviews.author: Charmedblueeyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because I get a dark tan much faster than the other products I used. this is like a sun magnet. I got this product because I want to get tan fast with a low SPF, if that. I wasn't looking for protection from the sun so if you are I do not recommended this product, but if you want that bronze tan look no more.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best secret for deep dark tan without laying out forever
customer_reviews.text: Instant bronze with a coffee scent. Not too heavy or oily/greasy. I reapplied often and it gave me a great tan/glow for my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gets you tan quick
customer_reviews.text: Best lotion ever! I love tanning and have worked in the tanning industry for 7 years. Its a little oily and smells like coffee, but if you are looking to get tan, and have your skin stay hydrated this is the perfect product. I’ve bought this multiple times and have my friends and family addicted to it. This is best if used for outdoor tanning.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. And just after using 2 times its left a little color. I cant wait to see what this will do at the beach. The smell is ok and it will come off on your bathing suit but it washed out of a white bathing suit so I'm impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: I Used this amazing product in Cabo San Lucas for 5 days of ...
customer_reviews.text: I Used this amazing product in Cabo San Lucas for 5 days of Bliss... The saturation of the browning lotion blended so well with my skin from head to toe without any sunburn. It has a nice coffee scent and a creamy application that saturates nicely into the skin. 2 months later I still have an amazing tan and everywhere I go people comment on what a gorgeous tan I have, so I promote Maui Babe Browning lotion to them and ask them to share it with others... Thank you for this wonderful product! Cindy~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have never used a browning lotion before
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Florida and could really tell the difference. I applied sunscreen first and then this lotion. I definitely got more brown than red with this.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M

customer_reviews.title: Best browning lotion
customer_reviews.text: The best outdoor tanning lotion ever! I discovered it few years back and it’s all I’ll ever use. People compliment me on my color all the time! And my girlfriends always ask what I’m wearing that smells so good, Maui babe browning lotion! Smells coffee-ish!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good tan!
customer_reviews.text: This product gives you a nice tan if you already have a base. It’s very greasy and it stains your bathing suits and cover ups. However, if you can get passed all of that it does give you an amazing tan.
customer_reviews.author: Euridice Leto

customer_reviews.title: Great bronzing and smell
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No protection and I believe a lot of maybe not so good for you ingredients.. smells awesome . Instantly brown (do not wear white- assuming wouldn’t end well) I apply sunscreen over it after a half hour or hour due to my fair skin for protection
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Smells like soy sauce
customer_reviews.text: Used several times and saw no difference at all. Smells like soy sauce! And leaves oil stains on my patio chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weaver

customer_reviews.title: This product is very off putting
customer_reviews.text: So I was excited to try this but it smelled weird, is a weird consistency, and it is so fake brown that it instantly stained my hands...why would I put that on my body??
customer_reviews.author: crimegirl

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be good from the reviews and it was watery, drippy, and smelled like coffee. It also has an orange tint so it leaves you streaky when it drips off you.
customer_reviews.author: nsp

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: Its impossible to wear anything after you put it on for hours, its really think and greasy, but the outcome results are great, you'll look like chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Archangel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this browning lotion!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like teriyaki sauce but paired with a tropical sunscreen it’s fantastic!!! WORKS but make sure to rub it in really good 😀😀 my fav new go to lotion
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Brown Color in Less Time!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell the best and is pretty messy but bronzes like nothing else. My only tanning lotions. Last year, went away for a week and came back Island brown! Be careful of light clothing, does stain and does melt after sweating in the hot sun!
customer_reviews.author: T. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning lotion!!
customer_reviews.text: The best tanning lotion!! It gives the best brown color of any outdoor lotions! The smell is a lil much at first but if you really like coffee you'll like it lol Still need SPF it has none obviously. I use my SPF 50 and it works amazing still!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought a tube last summer and one this summer. It works well. However I noticed the tube from last summer smells better and is darker. The older one smells more like coffee, while the newer lotion smells more like soy sauce. Either way it smells okay and more importantly it works well. Only complaint is the price is pretty high for what you get but then again it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Powders

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$
customer_reviews.text: Put it on half my body while laying out for 2 days. That side may have been a fraction darker, not by much though. It has a funky smell, very great and will stain. Not worth the $$$. An oil with spf would do the same or better.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R.

customer_reviews.title: Returning item and taking the hit on the over priced ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning item and taking the hit on the over priced shipping back cost. I found this product in CVS it's oily, I didn't care for the smell and didn't really notice a difference than getting some sun without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Verrastro

customer_reviews.title: No burns
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing product. Have used it in Florida, Hawaii and Michigan. I like that you only need a little bit. It covers so beautifully. I'm blonde and blue eyed. I never burned with this product
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wills

customer_reviews.title: Rich, dark, natural looking tan
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is truly fantastic. If you haven’t gotten a base tan I would recommend layering it over a sunscreen the first few times you go out because the oils can certainly make you burn inadvertently early in the season. However, I’m naturally fair-skinned and this product is the only thing I’ve ever found that gives a deep, rich, brown tan in almost no time flat.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Elliott Aspinwall

customer_reviews.title: 5star
customer_reviews.text: best outside tanning lotion you'll ever use. Careful with light color bikinis because of staining however it will wash off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product helps to acheive a tan
customer_reviews.text: This is a tanning accelerator and worked well. The product arrived in tact..not like some people had issues with mine was perfect. It does not protect from sun but it does give you a nice brown tone.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Barker

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. I did not notice a deeper tan ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. I did not notice a deeper tan with the use though. I had purchased the fox tax, which is much more expensive, and I did see a significant deeper tan with its use, but thought I'd try the Maui Babe based on the reviews. Perhaps, as with all products, they work differently with each skin type. I will be going back to fox tan.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Hawaii years ago & thrilled that amazon has it. Great bronzer & keeps your skin moist. I’m very dark because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Helene M. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Love my tan
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! And really helps you tan! Only down fall is it turns your towels slightly brown so don’t use a white one. Other than that love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and holds up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff and does the job at a fair price. If you use this and get 30 minutes of sun a day for a week, you will get a great tan based on your skin type. You do not half to bake out in the sun for hours for this product to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Roscher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this browning lotion- the iodine in it does brown your legs a little more instantly but it is still a great moisturizer for the sun as well
customer_reviews.author: Kalynn

customer_reviews.title: it smells good. the application is fine
customer_reviews.text: it smells good. the application is fine. stains hands while applying though but it washes off easy. stains stuff also so be careful. I have used the whole bottle in direct Florida sunlight and I am barely a tint darker which I cannot attribute to this product. It seems more like it was just normal exposure to the sun. In fact, I think this product prevented tanning. Idk. but I did not get the tan I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Stains!
customer_reviews.text: While I absolutely love the smell & how this lotion goes on, I totally had forgotten about how bad it stains. I can only wear it with certain bathing suits (black or ones I don’t care about) because it’s almost impossible to not get it on your suit. And it’s a dark brown that does not wipe away. It’s great in the sun, no SPF so it does not protect - but good for laying out at home around the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am a very pale person. I don't tan easily at all, mostly just burn. A friend reccomended this tanning lotion and I'm blown away. I tan so easily and I also bought the after tanning lotion to prevent burns and fading. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great for creating soft bronzed skin
customer_reviews.text: Gives a nice bronze sunny look when you apply and makes your skin feel so soft afterwords. It defiantly isn’t a sun blocker if your looking for that but for an even soft tan, it’s great. I’m fine with the smell because it doesn’t have the fake fragrance they put in a lot of products. Also only downside I found is you have to let it sink into the skin for about fifteen minutes offside it comes off in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: This gives my skin a beautiful golden glow
customer_reviews.text: This gives my skin a beautiful golden glow. The smell is different from most tanning lotion but not unpleasant, you get used to it pretty fast at least. Definitely a little on the oily side but I don't mind because I feel like it keeps my skin nice and moisturized. Will leave stains on your clothes so I always take old clothes to change into after if I am taking it to a tanning bed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: Maui Babe Browning Lotion 8 Ounces
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Maui Babe Browning Lotion 8 Ounces
feature_bullets: DESCRIPTION: All natural browning lotion made from a secret Hawaiian formula
USES: Yields a beautiful natural tan by accelerating the sun triggered tanning process
DETAILS: Designed for all skin types and tones, including sensitive and fair skin

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
